## What are Ben 10 Games?
 
Ben 10 is a franchise created by Man of Action Studios and produced by Cartoon Network Studios. It follows the adventures of Ben Tennyson, a young boy who can transform into different alien forms using a device called the Omnitrix. The franchise has spawned several animated series, movies, comic books, toys, and video games.
